entry.title: Wednesday: Mainly cloudy. High 17.
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of showers near the Cariboo mountains. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud in the afternoon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning.
